content: {"name": "Salvation Army Astoria Corps", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves Astoria , Long Island city and Sunnyside , If you need to get register come on Monday. Once you will get registered with salvation food pantry you can make appointment on plentiful.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.salvationarmyusa.org/usn/cure-hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "45-18 Broadway", "address_2": "", "city": "Queens", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11103", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.756626, "longitude": -73.914551}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 721-9046", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on Christmas & New Year"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required for all members of the household"}]}
